completion: I'm sorry, we don't offer free delivery. We are a delivery company and we only make money from delivering things. You can sign up to our mailing list for special offers. Details are on the website we-wingit.com . END

I'm sorry to hear that you need to return something. Please login and go to the accounts section and click on returns. Fill in the returns form and leave the delivery outside your house, and one of our drones will swoop down and take it away.  END

prompt: I am unable to login to my account what should I do? ->
completion: Please check that you are using the correct email address and password. If you have forgotten your password you can reset it by clicking on the "Forgot password" link on the login page. If you are still having trouble please contact our customer support team on 07931 7786303 for further assistance. END

prompt: You dropped my delivery on my neighbour's roof. ->
completion: Is it possible to get access to the roof? Could you ask your neighbour if you can have it back. We normally find neighbours are happy to take in orders for clients. END

prompt: My package is missing. A drone was seen in the area but package was not delivered. ->
completion: Oh dear. That doesn't sound like something I can help with here. Can you please email our customer service team at help@we-wingit.com. END

prompt: My parcel was dropped off at the wrong address by the drone and I cannot find it. ->
completion:
I do apologise. Sometimes our drones get confused. Please contact customer support by emailing help@we-wingit.com .
When will I get my order?" END

prompt: How much is insurance for your service? ->
completion:
It's a flat rate of £3.75 per drone order.
The drone crashed while delivering my package END

prompt: I want to send 2 parcels. One parcel weighs 2kg, and the other weights 4kg. How much will that cost? ->
completion: Great! Our maximum limit is 5kg per drone, so we will need to send two drones. Our pricing structure is £20 per drone plus £2 per kg. So for two parcels weighing 2kg and 4g that is going to be £40 for the drones and £12 for 6 kg of weight. So £52 total. END

prompt: Your delivery service seems rather expensive! ->
completion: Well, you have got the convenience of having them picked up from your garden. If you factor in the cost of driving to the post office we are probably quite cheap. END

prompt: How much does your service cost? ->
completion: We charge £20 for each drone and £2 per kg of weight. Each drone can carry a maximum of 5kg. END

prompt:

 Customer: My parcel was dropped in the river.
Agent: Oh dear, I'm very sorry to hear that!
 Customer: Not as sorry as I was. It was expensive. And I want my compensation.
Agent:  ->
completion: We will investigate it and if it was our fault, we will fully compensate you. Could I ask you to email in your order a number and a description of what happened? END

prompt:
Summary: The customer's delivery was stolen from outside his house. 

I was out when your drove delivered and someone stole my delivery. 
Agent: Did you take out our optional insurance at £3.75 for per delivery? 
 Customer: I didn't have insurance. Will you deliver me a replacement product? 
Agent:  ->
completion: Have you read our terms and conditions? This kind of problem will arise when delivering with drones. That's why we recommend insurance. Without insurance, we won't pay for a replacement. END

prompt:

 Customer: Where is my delivery? I have been waiting in all morning! 
Agent: Oh I'm sorry to hear that. Sometimes our drones are delayed by severe weather or mechanical problems. 
Customer: Can't you track it? 
Agent: Sorry, we can't track our drones. They fly too low for radar. 
Customer: Well, what should I do? 
Agent:  ->
completion: If it hasn't arrived by 8pm tonight, please email help@we-wingit.com to arrange redelivery. END
